dcterms:creator: J. Slaney
S. Thiébaux
dcterms:description: The blocks world domain consists of blocks stacked on top of each other to form towers. The goal of the agent in this task is to stack all the blocks on a single tower.
dcterms:title: Blocks World (Stack task)

dcterms:creator: J. Slaney
S. Thiébaux
dcterms:description: The Unstack task is another subproblem in the blocks world domain where the goal of the agent is to unstack all the blocks on the floor.
dcterms:title: Blocks World (Unstack task)

dcterms:creator: J. Slaney
S. Thiébaux
dcterms:description: The goal of the agent is to stack a specific block on top of another block. This problem is comparatively difficult because the optimal policy here is hierarchical in nature.
dcterms:title: Blocks World (On task)

dcterms:creator: C. Boutilier
R. Reiter
B. Price
dcterms:description: The logistics domain consists of entities like trucks, boxes, and cities. The goal of the agent for this task is to unload at least one box in the destination city.
dcterms:title: Logistics
